Air Canvas 04 Oct, 2024 - 05 Dec, 2024
Mentor: Prof. Sushil Kulkarni | Team Size: 1
Key Skills: Python Opencv Python Mediapipe
Air Canvas, a digital drawing tool that allows users to draw in the air using their hands without the need for traditional input devices such
as a mouse or stylus. The system leverages real-time hand tracking technology powered by Mediapipe and OpenCV to capture the
user's hand gestures and translate them into drawing commands on a virtual canvas.

opportunities. Individuals can access diverse courses, from coding to art, in a user-friendly interface.
